attributes.action: Introduce a cycle road tax and accident insurance for all cyclists over 17 years of age using public roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cyclists are increasing in numbers as road users without adequate compulsory training in road safety and with no contribution toward the cost of road use. There is currently no compulsory accident cover for riders or parties involved in cycle induced accidents.

A cycle road tax for adults 17 years or older is proposed, the tax to be used to assist in the establishment and maintenance of road shared cycle ways.

The accident insurance used to add protection for cyclists and other road users in event of cyclist induced accidents.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
